about_the_game:
"Control the odds!"

You are trapped in "J-Room."
By whom? For what purpose? What is J-Room?
You know nothing.
You attempt to escape.
However, a strange creature blocks your way.

Concept of "J-Room"
Casual × Horror × Turn-Based Strategy.
Playable using only a mouse.

Description of "J-Room"
A casual turn-based strategic horror game.

Katana beats Matchlock Gun and deals 4 damage to the opponent.
Kabuto beats Katana and inflicts Paralysis on the opponent.
Matchlock Gun beats Kabuto and deals 3 damage to the opponent.

However, it’s not a simple three-way deadlock.
The power and success rate of each weapon are different.

The strange creature’s actions can be controlled using Cards.
Making the creature take actions favorable to you is the shortcut to victory.

However, it won’t be that easy.
The creature won’t always take high-probability actions.
Additionally, the cards you can use are determined randomly.

Only those who master probability and align luck with themselves can progress.

During your journey, various characters will support you.
We hope you can escape from "J-Room."

Note
Please report bugs or typos on the Steam forum of each game.
[X] For P6Game’s game information → @P6Game_official

name: J-Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 4500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: J-Room is a casual turn-based strategy horror game that can be played using only a mouse. Katana beats the Matchlock Gun. The Matchlock Gun beats Kabuto. Kabuto beats Katana. The actions of the monstrous entities are controlled through Cards. We wish you the best of luck in escaping from J-Room.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Ukrainian, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Czech, Danish, Turkish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
